Human Connectome Project - Young Adult

About the dataset

https://www.humanconnectome.org/study/hcp-young-adult
https://www.humanconnectome.org/study/hcp-young-adult/overview/

PI
Kamil Ugurbil (UMinn)
David Van Essen (WashU)

Funding
NIH Blueprint for Neuroscience Research

Citations

  1. Van Essen DC, Smith SM, Barch DM, Behrens TE, Yacoub E, Ugurbil K; WU-Minn HCP Consortium. The WU-Minn Human Connectome Project: an overview. Neuroimage. 2013 Oct 15;80:62-79. doi: 10.1016/j.neuroimage.2013.05.041. Epub 2013 May 25. PMID: 23702424; PMCID: PMC3724347.

Data Access

The pennlinc_hcpya project on CUBIC is not open-access data. Access requires proof of ConnectomeDB registration and acceptance of the HCP open data terms (send email to Tien.Tong@PennMedicine.upenn.edu).

QSIRecon was run on the minimally preprocessed data, which were downloaded on the fly and removed upon completion of the QSIRecon job.

Number of Sessions Completed Software Version Datalad Dataset Ephemeral Clone
